notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: L.G.K. (corresponding author) designed the study, oversaw the collection of data, participated in the interpretation of phylogeographic results, contributed to the writing the manuscript, and oversaw the final production of the paper. D.P. performed the phylogeographic analyses and contributed to the writing of the manuscript. D.S. participated in the interpretation of the results, contributed to the writing of the manuscript and the production of the figures and tables. J.H. performed the laboratory work obtaining the viral nucleotide sequences. M.O. and I.M. performed the phylogeographic analyses and contributed to the writing of the manuscript. Z.S participated in the interpretation of the results and contributed to the writing and editing of the manuscript. The contributing authors collectively listed as “Cyprus PWID Network” participated in the collection of blood samples from consenting people who inject drugs attending five therapy centers in Cyprus. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
